Detailed Description

Data structure containing the parameters for solving the tv optimisation problem using DR.

int sopt_tv_param::real_meas

Flag for real measurements, i.e. real prox l2-ball. 1 if real, 0 for complex.

int sopt_tv_param::real_out

Flag for real output signal, i.e. real tv-prox. 1 if real, 0 for complex.

double sopt_tv_param::rel_obj

Convergence criteria. Minimum relative change of the objective value.

int sopt_tv_param::verbose

Verbose flag: 0 no log, 1 a summary at convergence, 2 print main steps (default: 1).
